title: Features
excerpt: WikiPeep is made on PHP — fully Object Oriented 🌿 Based on some Symfony Components, like Console and HttpFoundation, a strong Markdown parser, a JSON flat database powered by Flywheel. Originally inspired by GetOutline, WikiPeep provides a beautiful and friendly User Interface with readable fonts and a super fast search with autocomplete made with Vanilla JavaScript!
